title: Firefox will not open.
content: I've used Firefox sporadically for a couple of years. Last week it would not open. I refreshed, then uninstalled and reinstalled and it still won't open. What do I do now?
creator: cmrexx

title: FIREFOX UPDATE WON'T LET ME LOG INTO 2 SITES
content:
I no longer can log into Walgreens but I can on Edge (who I HATE) I've tried the following: 1. Close Firefox and reopen it. 2. Tried reboot my computer 3. Cleared cookies. 4. Clear cache. WALGREENS.COM: I get a red pop up that states "We are sorry for the inconvenience, but this service is currently unavailable.

MICHAELS.COM: (firefox has the password saved) when I use that login, it just brings me back to the Michaels home page but I am not logged in. If I manual type it all in.... it gives me this: Access Denied You don't have permission to access "http://www.michaels.com/Account?" on this server. Reference #18.8ef4d517.1674517774.411c3b08

I would really prefer to stay with Firefox and I have used it for years (as well as Thunderbird) but it is really insane that I have to go to Edge every week to place orders.

Any help would be greatly appreciate.
creator: judiellen

title: Feature Request: We the users desire want Firefox to Add The Option to "generate a brand new securely generated password"
content: 2023 Jan 23rd 5:57pm cst -- Feature Request: We the users want Firefox to Add an Option to "generate a brand new securely generated password -- at the point of filling-in-the-blanks to Create New Login. This has been an issue for years now (since at least May of 2020). Do we need to start a petition? If yes, how can we initiate a petition?
creator: amelia2whitehead
